item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Str3ngthzzz Str3ngthzzz
item.description:
@Str3ngthzzz wrote:

[quote=“Sick of Air, post:5, topic:90338”] else if(useItemID == ITEM && atObjectID == OBJECT) { deleteItem(ITEM, getItemSlot(ITEM), 1); addItem(ITEM, AMOUNT); addSkillXP((EXP*playerLevel[7]), 7); }[/quote]

i tried this and got a few errors.
then i downloaded a testscape source and tried to copy else if(useItemID == 377 && atObjectID == 2728)//lobbies { if((playerLevel[7]) <= 69) { sendMessage("You need to be level 70 cooking to cook lobsters."); } else if((playerLevel[7]) >= 69) { sendMessage("You cook the lobster."); addSkillXP((400*playerLevel[7]), 7); deleteItem(377,getItemSlot(377), 1); addItem(379, 1); } }
and just paste in my client.java and i still got 2 errors…here are the errors i got.

client.java:20311: variable useItemID might not have been initialized else if<useItemID == 377 && at ObjectID == 2728>//lobbies ^ client.java:20311: variable useItemID might not have been initialized else if<useItemID == 377 && at ObjectID == 2728>//lobbies ^

[br][size=1]Posted on: May 06, 2007, 02:27:34 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Str3ngthzzz”][quote author=Sick of Air link=topic=131938.msg1277011#msg1277011 date=1178499013]

else if(useItemID == ITEM && atObjectID == OBJECT) { deleteItem(ITEM, getItemSlot(ITEM), 1); addItem(ITEM, AMOUNT); addSkillXP((EXP*playerLevel[7]), 7); }
[/quote]

i tried this and got a few errors.
then i downloaded a testscape source and tried to copy else if(useItemID == 377 && atObjectID == 2728)//lobbies { if((playerLevel[7]) <= 69) { sendMessage("You need to be level 70 cooking to cook lobsters."); } else if((playerLevel[7]) >= 69) { sendMessage("You cook the lobster."); addSkillXP((400*playerLevel[7]), 7); deleteItem(377,getItemSlot(377), 1); addItem(379, 1); } }
and just paste in my client.java and i still got 2 errors…here are the errors i got.

client.java:20311: variable useItemID might not have been initialized else if<useItemID == 377 && atObjectID == 2728>//lobbies ^ client.java:20311: variable useItemID might not have been initialized else if<useItemID == 377 && atObjectID == 2728>//lobbies ^[/quote]
